definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: You'd better send your certificate through registered post because it is safer.
sentences.chinese: 買房時不要忘了帶戶口本，這是很重要的證件。

sentences.english: OK finally by registered permanent residence this such effective certificate is dealt with afresh.
sentences.chinese: 最後可以憑戶口本這樣的有效證件重新辦理。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, your name will appear in my family's account.
sentences.chinese: 早晚有一天你的名字會出現在我家的戶口本上。

sentences.english: I find identity papers and boxes from the accounts forwarded to him.
sentences.chinese: 我從箱子裏找出身份證和戶口本遞給他。

sentences.english: ID Card of Beneficiary, Household Registry, Resume, Copy of Beneficiary's University Diploma.
sentences.chinese: 受益人身份證，戶口本，簡歷，大學文憑的拷貝。

sentences.english: But one by one and away from the accounts of the still to find out, two people divorce.
sentences.chinese: 但是一一和朝暉還是把戶口本找了出來，兩人離婚了。

sentences.english: Now go back and change under the account book, down the gauntlet for them to apply too late.
sentences.chinese: 現在回去改下戶口本，下戰書再辦理還來得及。

sentences.english: If you only then the ID card is insufficient, but also wants the household register.
sentences.chinese: 你如果只有身份證是不夠的，還要戶口本。

sentences.english: 37 one day your name will appear in my account book.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天你的名字會出現在我家戶口本上。

sentences.english: May I see your household registration.
sentences.chinese: 能不能把戶口本讓我看看？

definition: identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
a pass (authority to enter)/a laissez-passer or safe conduct
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]
